title: Bamma Mata Bangarubata (1989) Telugu Xvid 2cd - No Subs - Bhanum
description:
Bamma Mata Bangarubata (1989) Telugu Xvid 2cd - No Subs - Bhanumati [DDR]

Bamma Maata Bangaru Baata is a comedy Telugu film released in 1990 starring Bhanumathi Ramakrishna, Rajendra Prasad, Gouthami, Nutan Prasad and Brahmanandam. 
This film was directed by Rajasekhar and produced under the banner AVM Productions.

Even though critically and commercially acclaimed, this film is infamous for an accident in which Nutan Prasad broke his back. This left him paralysed from the waist down and he had to use a wheelchair.
